item.title: Blogging Platform Choices
item.description: I was laying on my lounge for New Years Eve 2018 (boring i know hey?). It wasn’t that bad, I was watching my favourite MTG Streamer playing Sorin’s Vengeance + Twincast, a beautiful… if not infuriating combination of magic cards. I had realised I had gone through 2018 without terribly many technical achievements in work and life. Sure, I had learned an amazing amount from my wonderful colleagues like Farooq, Nina, and Stefano.
